biotools.summary: FastMM is an efficient toolbox for personalized constraint-based metabolic modeling. In FastMM, most of the time-cost functions of metabolic modeling are written by C. These functions including: flux variability analysis, genome-wide single gene knockout analysis, genome-wide double gene knockout analysis, genome-wide single metabolite knockout analysis, genome-wide double metabolite knockout analysis, and MCMC sampling.

bioschemas.name: FastMM
